text:
The Tamil Nadu Revenue Officials Association threatened to go on an indefinite strike, if the police failed to take action against Sub-Inspector Muthumari, attached to Aralvoimozhi police station, for his alleged indecent remarks against the District Revenue Officer A. Udhayakumar over phone for taking action against sand-laden lorries.

They staged a demonstration in front of the Collectorate on Monday.

Earlier on Sunday, an audio clipping of arguments between the District Revenue Officer and Muthumari was circulated in social media.
title: Demonstration
